attributes.action: All food containing chicken should say whether the chicken is free range or not.
attributes.background:
I think a lot of people would think twice about buying this food if knew wasn't free range. 
This will put pressure on companies to use free range.  
This includes restaurant and packaged foods.

rejection.details: This petition seems to be asking food manufacturers to take this action. If you would like Parliament to change the law, to require chicken to be labelled in this way, you could start a petition asking for that.
